update_log.change: New field for pharmacist name for Rfs app

parameters.name: action_type
parameters.description: Whether it is accepted and registration is successful

parameters.name: order_create_code
parameters.description: Use base64 AES encode, check to identify your permissions to write data for model and add variable to excel

parameters.name: price_id
parameters.description: Student's unique identifier for a clinic

parameters.name: is_approved
parameters.description: The validity of product activation. For items in pharmacy/clinic service, if they cannot view and modify their own records in the app, they should check to see if their activation code is properly activated. Product users must have an active code.

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: This message is a null API request or error

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if not error, Empty if no error occurred

error_codes.description: Prescription rules is already completed or canceled
There is no active_type or given
Prescription name is required. Please enter a valid name.

notes: The documentation shows common parameters, request parameters, response parameters, error codes and an update log. The API seems to be related to prescription handling and validation. Multiple URLs are shown for different environments but the base endpoint remains consistent.
